alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.separa.Text: If this button is bound, then it removes End Turn functionality from Pause button (Space) and assigns this to this button

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.collec.Text: Collects all loot and closes loot window

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.invent.Text: Activates search input field when you're in inventory menu.

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.nextch.Text: Moves selection to the next character.

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.nextta.Text:
In character menu moves selection to next page tab  (so Summary -> Features -> Archetypes ->...)
In inventory moves inventory filter (All -> Weapons -> Armor -> ...)

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.prevch.Text: Moves selection to the previous character

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.prevta.Text:
In character menu moves selection to previous page tab  (so Archetypes -> Features -> Summary ->...)
In inventory moves inventory filter (Armor -> Weapons -> All -> ...)

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.takenf.Text: Places already taken talents/abilities/etc at the bottom of selection list

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.rotate.Text: Rotate camera with right mouse button (Experimental)
Rotate camera with right mouse button instead of middle. You WILL lose some functionality normally done with RMB. See description.
